text.section: The use of unauthorized material by an applicant during an examination shall cause the immediate rejection of the application and shall bar the applicant from reexamination for at least 1 year.

section.section: An applicant who fails an examination or fails to appear for a scheduled examination shall file a new application and pay a new application fee.

text.section: An applicant who takes an examination required by this title shall be notified of the results of the examination as soon as practicable.
If an applicant fails an examination given under this subtitle, the applicant may retake the examination.
